posts.question: Angular4 web app Alternate for traditional iFrames
posts.description:
In my case i want to show different kind of 3rd party clients web pages in my Angular4 web application dynamically.

Currently We are using iframes to display external webpages in development phase.

Here problem is i cant force my clients to set iframe supporting http headers.

So we need an alternate for iframe(May be some library) which doesn't depend on http headers.

suggestions are appreciated. Thanks

answer.text: Hello sir could u explain the answer
